description:
Recent Updates:
-Tank engine has gas engine sound.
-Targeting Laser now stops when it hits things and gives a logic signal.
-Fix some bugs with seats/logic.
-Fix old code in lasers/missiles so they detect players/seats correctly.
-New "Seat ReExiter Teleporter" part. Connect a seat to it and you will teleport to its location upon esit. I made it to avoid getting stuck in the roof in small vehicles, but it's basically a teleporter.
-Seat Logic reader new modes: left/right mouse click, scroll up/down, and space (space doesn't exit seat when being detected as logic). 
-Seat Logic reader now has GUI for selecting modes.
-Seats have survival seat bearing control. Also space bar is disabled form jumping out of seat.
-Tank Engine/Tracks work with survival seats.
name: MJM SciFi Mod
